scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of figures in a landscape setting. In the foreground, a man kneels, reaching out with his arm. To his left, a bearded man with a halo and a sword at his side stands looking towards the center. In the center, two figures embrace, one with a halo, and another figure with a beard. Behind them, a group of soldiers in armor and helmets are gathered. The background is a simple landscape with rolling hills and a golden border at the top.
